popover.primary: A mastery path focused on healing and restorative powers
A mastery path focused on offensive and damaging powers
A mastery path focused on hindering and weakening foes

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 1464 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Resurrects all groupmates within {COM_1_RADI_FEET}. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for {ABIL_3884_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} over {ABIL_3884_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, and they will deal {ABIL_3876_COM_0_VAL0}% more damage for {ABIL_3876_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Arcane Suppression
data.description: Knocks back all enemies within 20 feet and Silences them, making them unable to use magic for 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Knocks back all enemies within 20 feet and Silences them, making them unable to use magic for 3 seconds.

data.name: Arcing Power
data.description: Whenever one of your damaging spells hits an enemy, your defensive target will become healed for 25% of the damage that you dealt.
data.rawDescription: Whenever one of your damaging spells hits an enemy, your defensive target will become healed for 25% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Balance Essence
data.description:
Deals 200 Spirit damage to your target, and heals your defensive target for 488 health plus 150% of the damage done.

When casting this ability, you will focus your power into ensuring a hit rather than for maximum damage, causing it to be 20% less likely to be Blocked or Disrupted.
data.rawDescription:
Deals {ABIL_2859_COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} to your target, and heals your defensive target for {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} plus 150% of the damage done.

When casting this ability, you will focus your power into ensuring a hit rather than for maximum damage, causing it to be 20% less likely to be Blocked or Disrupted.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Elemental resistance by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Blessing of Isha
data.description: Heals your entire group for 643 health.
data.rawDescription: Heals your entire group for {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH}.

data.name: Blinding Light
data.description: For 5 seconds, your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them will take an additional 1 second to build up all abilities.
data.rawDescription: For 5 seconds, your target and all other enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of them will take an additional 1 second to build up all abilities.

data.name: Bolstering Boon
data.description: Boon Of Hysh will now also grant the target 250 points of Morale.
data.rawDescription: Boon Of Hysh will now also grant the target {ABIL_9242_COM_2_VAL0} points of Morale.

data.name: Boon of Hysh
data.description:
Heals your target for 883 health.
This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it.
data.rawDescription:
Heals your target for {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH}.
This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 Spirit damage over 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional {ABIL_3995_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} Spirit damage over {ABIL_3995_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Cleansing Flare
data.description: Deals 205 Spirit damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them, and knocks them backwards.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} to your target and all other enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of them, and knocks them backwards.

data.name: Cleansing Light
data.note:
Target must be Hexed or Ailing
Force reduces cooldown.
Builds Tranquility
data.description: You cleanse an ally's wound and remove one Ailment or Hex. If an effect is removed, your ally will absorb up to 175 damage over 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You cleanse an ally's wound and remove one Ailment or Hex. If an effect is removed, your ally will absorb up to {COM_2_VAL1_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Desperation
data.description: Your healing abilities become 40% more effective when the target is below 25% hit points and Magical Infusion will make its target 25% more receptive to incoming heals.
data.rawDescription: Your healing abilities become {COM_0_VAL1}% more effective when the target is below 25% hit points and Magical Infusion will make its target 25% more receptive to incoming heals.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.
data.rawDescription: Your attacks have a {COM_0_VAL1}% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Willpower by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Dispel Magic
data.description: All of your damaging spells gain a 25% chance to remove 1 Blessing from the victim.  Whenever this happens, they will also suffer an additional 150 Spirit damage.
data.rawDescription: All of your damaging spells gain a 25% chance to remove 1 Blessing from the victim.  Whenever this happens, they will also suffer an additional {COM_2_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}.

data.name: Dissipating Energies
data.description: A groupmate becomes surrounded by dangerous energies for 5 seconds.  Every 1 seconds, all enemies within 30 feet of them will suffer 146 Spirit damage.
data.rawDescription: A groupmate becomes surrounded by dangerous energies for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  Every {COM_0_FREQ_SECONDS}, all enemies within {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_RADI_FEET} of them will suffer {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}.

data.name: Dissipating Hatred
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds.  If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.
data.rawDescription: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only {COM_0_VAL0}% damage to you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.
data.rawDescription: A strong heal that will restore {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} to your target.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your casted heals become 20% less effective.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage, but all of your casted heals become {COM_1_VAL1}% less effective.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.
data.rawDescription: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} that will absorb up to {COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE} from melee abilities.

data.name: Drain Magic
data.description: You siphon magic from your target, draining 180 Action Points over 9 seconds into yourself.
data.rawDescription: You siphon magic from your target, draining {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_ACTIONPOINTS} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} into yourself.

data.name: Empowered Lores
data.description: Whenever you critically hit with an ability that builds either Force or Tranquility, you will gain one additional point. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Whenever you critically hit with an ability that builds either Force or Tranquility, you will gain one additional point. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Energy of Vaul
data.description:
A wash of power leeches the breath from your target and up to four other enemies within 25 feet of them, dealing 251 Spirit damage to each. Their stolen breath will heal your defensive target and allies within 20 feet of them for 809 health, plus 50% of the total inflicted damage.

When casting this ability, you will focus your power into ensuring a hit rather than for maximum damage, causing it to be 20% less likely to be Blocked or Disrupted.
data.rawDescription:
A wash of power leeches the breath from your target and up to four other enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of them, dealing {ABIL_2303_COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} to each. Their stolen breath will heal your defensive target and allies within {COM_2_RADI_FEET} of them for {ABIL_2303_COM_3_VAL0_HEALTH}, plus 50% of the total inflicted damage.

When casting this ability, you will focus your power into ensuring a hit rather than for maximum damage, causing it to be 20% less likely to be Blocked or Disrupted.

data.name: Flames of the Phoenix
data.description: Flames burst from a spot that you select, damaging all enemies within 20 feet of that spot for up to 4 seconds, as long as you maintain your concentration.
data.rawDescription: Flames burst from a spot that you select, damaging all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of that spot for up to 4 seconds, as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.
data.rawDescription: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Radiant Burst
data.description: Radiant Lance will now affect all enemies within 15 feet of your target.
data.rawDescription: Radiant Lance will now affect all enemies within {ABIL_9237_COM_2_RADI_FEET} of your target.

data.name: Funnel Energy
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet have their action point costs increased by 50% for 15 seconds, and all allies in the area have their action point costs reduced by 50% for 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: All enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} have their action point costs increased by 50% for 15 seconds, and all allies in the area have their action point costs reduced by 50% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Funnel Essence
data.description: You focus your powers on your defensive target, restoring up to 1256 health to them over 3 seconds.  This effect will end if you break your concentration, or if you run out of action points.
data.rawDescription: You focus your powers on your defensive target, restoring up to {COM_1_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} to them over {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.  This effect will end if you break your concentration, or if you run out of action points.

data.name: Fury of Asuryan
data.description: Calls forth the wrath of Asuryan in the form of a pillar of magical energy, dealing 309 Spirit damage to your target.
data.rawDescription: Calls forth the wrath of Asuryan in the form of a pillar of magical energy, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} to your target.

data.name: Gift of Life
data.note:
Force reduces cast time.
Only usable on Dead Players
data.description: Resurrects your target with 20% health.

data.rawDescription: Shield of Saphery will now grant immunity to Stun and Knockdown effects while active.

data.name: Healing Energy

data.name: Magical Infusion
data.description: Infuses protective magic into an ally for 30 seconds, allowing them to recover from near fatal wounds.If the allies health is reduced below 25%, this effect will immediately dispel itself to restore 711 health if they are still alive. A player may only be affected by a single Magical Infusion at a time.

A player may only be affected by a single Magical Infusion at a time.

data.name: Wind Blast
data.description: You call forth a powerful gust of wind which slams into enemies within 30 feet of you, knocking players away a medium distance and knocking monsters down.  Anyone hit by the wind becomes snared, reducing their run speed by 20% for 10 seconds.
